articles.title: Matt Layman: Tailwind CSS on Python and Heroku - Building SaaS
articles.description: Tailwind CSS is a fantastic tool for making CSS easy to use on your webapps. On the video, I added Tailwind CSS to my Django app and showed how to use it and deploy it to Heroku (which required some extra configuration for JavaScript support).
